files.content:
import {
  Breadcrumb,
  BreadcrumbItem,
  BreadcrumbLink,
  BreadcrumbList,
  BreadcrumbPage,
  BreadcrumbSeparator,
} from "@/registry/default/ui/breadcrumb";
import { ChevronRight } from "lucide-react";

export default function BorderedBreadcrumb() {
  return (
    <Breadcrumb className="p-6">
      <BreadcrumbList>
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbLink
            href="/"
            className="px-3 py-1 border border-border rounded hover:bg-muted transition-colors"
          >
            Home
          </BreadcrumbLink>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbSeparator>
          <ChevronRight className="h-4 w-4" />
        </BreadcrumbSeparator>
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbLink
            href="/products"
            className="px-3 py-1 border border-border rounded hover:bg-muted transition-colors"
          >
            Products
          </BreadcrumbLink>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbSeparator>
          <ChevronRight className="h-4 w-4" />
        </BreadcrumbSeparator>
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbLink
            href="/products/categories"
            className="px-3 py-1 border border-border rounded hover:bg-muted transition-colors"
          >
            Categories
          </BreadcrumbLink>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
        <BreadcrumbSeparator>
          <ChevronRight className="h-4 w-4" />
        </BreadcrumbSeparator>
        <BreadcrumbItem>
          <BreadcrumbPage className="px-3 py-1 border border-primary rounded bg-primary/10 font-medium">
            Electronics
          </BreadcrumbPage>
        </BreadcrumbItem>
      </BreadcrumbList>
    </Breadcrumb>
  );
}
